thread.title: BRIEF-IFS says wins follow-up order worth SEK 35 mln
thread.title_full: BRIEF-IFS says wins follow-up order worth SEK 35 mln | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-IFS says wins follow-up order worth SEK 35 mln
text:
Sept 29 IFS AB
* Says international service company upgrades to IFS Applications 9
* The agreement includes licenses and services valued at approximately SEK 35 million. This includes a total of SEK 10 million in license revenue
* Says the company will optimize field service management throughout its workforce comprising some 1,700 service technicians and back office staff in the Nordic region Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Stockholm Newsroom)
